H0.text: Cleaning the lenses with your fingers is a safety measure a student should take when handling a microscope.

H1.text: Keeping the magnifications switched is the safety measure a student should take when handling a microscope.

H2.text: Carrying the microscope with two hands at all times is the safety measure a student should take when handling a microscope.

H3.text: Make sure to put the microscope on an uneven surface is the safety measure a student should take when handling a microscope.
